title: Utilizing machine learning to enhance performance of thin-film solar cells based on Sb2(SxSe1−x)3: investigating the influence of material properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27749-27763
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03340J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tanvir Mahtab Khan, Okba Saidani, Sheikh Rashel Al Ahmed
Herein, SCAPS-1D is used to model a novel Cd-free Sb2(S,Se)3 TFSC. The proposed Sb2(S,Se)3 cell with Cu2O HTL and WS2 ETL reduces carrier recombination loss. An efficiency of 30.18% is obtained. This study also focuses on implementation of ML method.
